name: Tiles Rupture
description:
“Tiles Rupture” is a top-down arcade about changing the increasingly complicated map. The player must survive on the map until a new obstacle appears with each rise of the platforms, which gradually improves. The player can also use a dash to avoid taking damage The game was created in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. The theme was “LET THERE BE CHAOS“ Controls:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Dash: SHIFT
